content: When my family lived in a rented house, in the backyard of it, I played with coconut shells on the sand. I imagined them as habitats on a different planet. The water from the faucet became a river.
translations: ita:Quando la mia famiglia viveva in una casa in affitto, nel cortile di casa, giocavo con i gusci di cocco sulla sabbia. Li
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by nonong (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
